name: TileImages
description: TileImages allows assembling images into a multi-dimensional array, producing a single output image. The input images must have a dimension less than or equal to the specified output image dimension.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The path for the output tiled image.

inputs.name: Layout
inputs.description: Defines the structure of the tiled output image. The layout dictates the number and arrangement of input images in the output image.

inputs.name: Input Images
inputs.description: Input images to be tiled into the output image. The number of input images should match the layout specification.

author: ANTs Developers
